CHANGELOG
=========

v0.9.6 - 27 Feb. 2016
---------------------

* Define all used HTTP methods as uppercase according to spec [#83](https://github.com/marmelab/restful.js/pull/83) ([opengeek](https://github.com/opengeek))


v0.9.5 - 11 Feb. 2016
---------------------
